subject: Re: New: Gainesville House EVPs!
author: Lance Oliver
full_text:
I'm still working like mad to finish isolating more EVPs we got on 
our audio recorders. It seems to more I listen, the more I find...

Has anyone been brave enough to give ear to the ones I've posted so 
far?

Thanks,
Lance

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Lance Oliver" <orbhunterx@...> wrote:
>
> Good Evening!
> 
> I've been very busy today going through a long, intense audio 
> recording taken at the Gainesville, Texas house, which my team 
> investigated on Sunday, November 25th.
> 
> All of the EVPs I just posted were gathered in the unoccupied 
> upstairs bedroom. Only three investigators were present in the 
room. 
> Their voices have been properly taken into account and ruled out as 
> sources of the actual EVPs. 
> 
> The new and resampled EVPs have been saved as .mp3 files. They can 
be 
> freely downloaded from the site here -
> 
> http://www.filecrunch.com/user/orbhunterx
> 
> You will hear quite a few odd words, dog barks, and even mimicry. 
> Some of the voices are faint and whispery. Other EVP voices sound 
> like the invisibles are standing right along side the researchers!
> 
> Sexual Content Warning:
> 
> Several of the EVPs have strong sexual content. 
> 
> Please read the file name prior to downloading.
> 
> Listening to the EVPs will be at your own disgression.
> 
> That stated, those that choose to listen to the EVPs, please let me 
> know if any of them need further contextual clarification. I look 
> forward to hearing feedback. As it stands, the true nature of 
what's 
> going on in the house awaits much more serious attention. 
> 
> Sincerely,
> Lance Oliver, Founder
> Denton Area Paranormal Society
>
